Historical Place:
Cox\'s Bazaar - famous for having the longest sea beach in the world.
Taj Mahal - a stunning white marble mausoleum built by Emperor Shah Jahan.
Lahore Fort - a UNESCO World Heritage Site, symbolizing the grandeur of Mughal architecture.
Mount Everest - the highest peak in the world, attracting climbers from across the globe.
Punaka Dzong - a historical fortress and one of Bhutan\'s most iconic landmarks.
